item.description:
Official NHC COED Softball Team will be holding a team practice/ pickup game on Saturday, April, 21th, 2007, at 12 noon at Memorial Field in East Haven, CT. approx 5 miles from downtown New Haven.

For those players who have not attended practice regularly, please try to attend at least one practice a week.

If you are not a team member and are interested in playing softball for fun or getting some sun and exercise, you are welcome as well.

***Post game BBQ at a nearby location to be announced at practice.***

Memorial Field in located at the intersection of Dodge Avenue and Roma Street, in East Haven.


Mapquest Map
item.name: CONFIRMED: NHC SOFTBALL TEAM PRACTICE
